name: Male literacy rate (Cressy (1980))
description: Percentage of witnesses who sign ecclesiastical court declarations, for the tradesmen and craftsmen in the dioceses of Norwich. Original data is in Table 7.3 (pg 146) provides the percentage who are illiterate. To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate).

source.name: Cressy (1980)
source.dataPublishedBy: Cressy, D., Literacy and the social order: reading and writing in Tudor and Stuart England (Cambridge, 1980). estimates illiteracy in the diocese of London (City and Middlesex) between, pp.1580-1700.
source.additionalInfo: Original data provides the percentage who are illiterate. To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate).
